project_abstract.cdata: The project would expand and improve the country's agricultural support services in the areas of research, education and training, extension services, sector planning, agricultural project development and regulatory services. The loan would finance expenditures for civil works; equipment, furniture and vehicles; salaries of expatriate and national staff; travel and subsistence expenses; operational expenses, such as materials and supplies, utilities, leasing and operation of vehicles; consultancies; and fellowships. If properly implemented, the project would be essentially risk-free.
